entries.title: Community and Operations Head
entries.description: In the 2 years of Working with Community Folks, I have built and scaled 5 thriving communities and have supported the growth of many. I led a small team for 2 of these projects.

entries.title: Community Head and Founding Team Member
entries.description: Looking for a challenge, I also joined Travander. My role majorly focused on designing community strategy aligned with the business goals. While also creating content for the website, emails, commuinty platform. Helping design strategies for Marketing, GTM, funding and overall growth of the business.

entries.title: Co-founder and Operations Head
entries.description: A3Designers was a passion project to revolutionize the real estate and the construction industry. I started it with 2 friends and scaled it to an annual turnover of INR 5 Million in the launch year.

entries.title: Graphic Designer and Editor
entries.description: I worked as a graphic designer for about 4 years. In this time I created various types of personalized graphics for my clients. I also built a community of my clients on Facebook.
